item.title: Melodic Death Metal playlist for 12/2014
item.description: Including: Allegaeon, Before The Dawn, Bloodshot Dawn, Brymir, Dark Tranquillity, Darkest Hour, Eternal Tears Of Sorrow, Heaven Shall Burn, Mors Principium Est, Slowmotion Apocalypse.

item.description: Including: Carcass, Children Of Bodom, Dark Tranquillity, Insomnium, Language Of The Dead*, Mors Principium Est, Parasite Inc., Svavelvinter, The Absence, Unmourned.
